body: So I'm Bored af like always because of school and I was wondering say the magical gods of avicus un banned me and avicus hasn't crumbled yet would any avicus team take me in and please don't be like oh you'll never get un banned or something like that I just wanted to know if any team would take me In for what's left of my known skills :p

title: What If.......

replies.body:
Sorry, but topics like these are considered attention seeking and not allowed on the forums. :( If you'd like to see if any team would/does want you, feel free to make a LFT.
